lead_paragraph: Paolo Bettini won the third stage of the Vuelta a España yesterday, and Óscar Freire held on to the overall leader’s gold jersey. Bettini held off a late surge from Freire, who was second with the same time of 4 hours 8 minutes 42 seconds.
